itemdesc-sandwich: You are marching into the unknown, armed with... nothing. Have a sandwich.
itemdesc-slicedbread-*-perfect: Sliced from a loaf of bread
itemdesc-slicedmeat: Sliced from cooked red or bush meat
itemdesc-slicedcheese: Sliced from 1/4 wheel of cheddar cheese
sammichesguide1-text:
What is Sammiches?
Sammiches adds sandwiches and other bread products into the game.
Sandwiches can contain up to 6 ingredients, including the slice of bread used to begin the sandwich creation.

Cutting Board
The cutting board is an essential tool required to use this mod. It is crafted with 1 board of any wood type in the crafting grid.

Slicing Bread
Sliced bread is the basis for all sandwiches, of course. Slicing bread on a cutting board with a knife or sword yields 4 slices of bread.

Sliced Foods
Some food items can only be placed on sandwiches when sliced.

To slice an ingredient, place it on the cutting board and use a knife or sword on it.
